name: Wolves Team
description:
is a multiplayer gun fighting VR game , having 3 modes .

PvC mode : All players are in one team , fighting zombies . Single player can play this mode . Killing the boss in limited time makes the mission completed .

PvP mode : Players are separated into 2 teams ( yellow or black ) , kill as many as possible in limited time , which team killing more win the game . This mode at least 2 players , up to 8 players .

tangled warfare mode : Players are separated individually , kill the others as many as possible in limited time , which one killing more win the game . This mode at least 2 players , up to 8 players .

It will shows the result at the end of the game .

Fit for party and competition .
